title: President Rajapaksa visits Bodh Gaya, India amid protests
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived at the Mahabodhi temple in Bodh Gaya, India this afternoon on Friday 08 February on a two day private visit for pilgrimage.
